message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
I understand your position, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  Could you do $13,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
